Solar_Panel.name: Solar Panel
Solar_Panel.description: Provides solar power to the system.

physics_models.name: Power Output
physics_models.coding_directives:
def calculate_power(efficiency, irradiance, area):
    return efficiency * irradiance * area
physics_models.python_code:
def calculate_power(efficiency, irradiance, area):
    return efficiency * irradiance * area
physics_models.coder_notes: Calculates power output based on efficiency, irradiance, and area.

Solar_Panel.verification_plan: Test under standard conditions to verify power output.

Filtration_Unit.name: Filtration Unit

physics_models.name: Flow Rate
physics_models.coding_directives:
def calculate_flow_rate(pressure_difference, viscosity, resistance):
    return pressure_difference / (viscosity * resistance)
physics_models.python_code:
def calculate_flow_rate(pressure_difference, viscosity, resistance):
    return pressure_difference / (viscosity * resistance)
physics_models.coder_notes: Calculates flow rate based on pressure difference, viscosity, and resistance.

Filtration_Unit.verification_plan: Test flow rate and contaminant removal efficiency.

Battery_Storage.name: Battery Storage
Battery_Storage.description: Stores excess solar power for later use.

physics_models.name: Capacity
physics_models.coding_directives:
def calculate_capacity(voltage, charge):
    return voltage * charge
physics_models.python_code:
def calculate_capacity(voltage, charge):
    return voltage * charge
physics_models.coder_notes: Calculates battery capacity based on voltage and charge.

Battery_Storage.verification_plan: Test battery capacity and discharge rate.

Control_Unit.name: Control Unit

embodiment.description: Basic control unit for system operation.

physics_models.name: Processing Power
physics_models.coding_directives:
def calculate_processing_power(clock_speed, cores):
    return clock_speed * cores
physics_models.python_code:
def calculate_processing_power(clock_speed, cores):
    return clock_speed * cores
physics_models.coder_notes: Calculates processing power based on clock speed and number of cores.
assumptions: Clock speed and cores are the only factors affecting processing power.
